projects.title: Freshup (Saloon App)
projects.bodyText:
- Barber App | Dart, Flutter, RESTful Api, Firebase, Hive (Caching)
 - Barber, Customer, and Admin access.
 - Allow users to register and log in securely.
 - Firebase authentication for user management.
 - Implement a Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture for clean and organized code.
 - Display a list of barber services.
 - Retrieve service data from a RESTful API.
 - Implement local caching using Hive for improved app performance.
 - Implement a booking system for users to schedule appointments.
 - Advertisement Section, News Updates, and Super Advertisements.
 - Implement localization for multi-language support.
 - Online payment using Stripe.

projects.title: Unify Experiences
projects.bodyText:
- **Unify Experiences** | Dart, Flutter, RESTful API, Firebase, Deeplink
  - **Authentication**: Firebase authentication for secure login and registration.
  - **Messaging System**: Real-time chat functionality using Firebase Firestore.
  - **Post and Stories Sharing**: Users can share posts and stories inside a room.
  - **Items to Sell**: Upload items for selling inside a room if admin permission is granted.
  - **Referrals**: Referral point system based on referral codes.
  - **Deeplinking**: Deeplinks for sharing posts, profiles, and rooms.
  - **Notification System**: Push notifications for new messages and activities.
  - **User Management**: Firebase Cloud Firestore for managing user data and chats.

projects.title: Bextr (Influencer Hiring App)
projects.bodyText:
- Bextr | Flutter, RESTful API, Firebase
 - A platform connecting influencers and brands for seamless collaborations.
 - Two user types: Influencers and Brands with tailored functionalities.
 - Brands can post detailed campaigns with budget and goals.
 - Influencers can explore campaigns and mark them as Interested or Not Interested.
 - Advanced filtering options based on follower size, country, niche, and more.
 - Influencers can apply for campaigns, and brands can review and accept offers.
 - Manage ongoing and completed collaborations in a dedicated section.
 - Supports multi-language accessibility with three languages.
 - Secure backend using Firebase for data management and authentication.
 - Real-time synchronization between brands and influencers for efficient communication.

projects.title: SmartMed
projects.bodyText:
- SmartMed | Machine Learning, Flutter, Firebase, Python
 - Machine learning-based disease diagnosis and medical service system.
 - Collect and analyze patient symptoms for accurate disease prediction.
 - Integrated smartwatch support for real-time health data monitoring.
 - Secure data storage and retrieval using Firebase.
 - User-friendly mobile app interface for patients and doctors.
 - Provide nearby hospital recommendations and appointment scheduling.
 - Implemented custom algorithms for symptom-based disease diagnosis.
 - Real-time data visualization for health monitoring.
 - Localization support for multi-language accessibility.

projects.title: Trading Journal
projects.bodyText:
- My Trading Journal App | Android, MVVM, ROOMDB
 - A powerful trading journal app with Light and Dark theme support.
 - Built with MVVM architecture for maintainable and efficient code.
 - Local data storage using ROOMDB for offline functionality.
 - Key Features:
 - Excel Import: Effortlessly import trading data from Excel.
 - Monthly Reports: Analyze performance with insightful monthly summaries.
 - Session Profits: Interactive charts for visualizing session-wise profits and losses.
 - Export Options: Export journal entries to Excel or PDF for detailed analysis.
 - Weekday Statistics: Track and identify the most profitable trading days.
 - Session-Based Analysis: Detailed insights into session-specific performance.
